inclusion.criterion: Progressive Metastatic Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Absence of Progressive Metastatic Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: A 15-year-old boy with asthma, diagnosed a year ago, presenting with shortness of breath and cough. He didn't respond to corticosteroid inhaler.
